Summary: Glowing Orb spotted at Edinboro University
divs: Sighting DetailsApproximately 12:45 AM in the morning my brother stopped outside for a cigarette. He said that he spotted a "glowing" orb above the trees, but thought it was the moon or a street-light, initially. The night was hazy. He went inside to get a camera (still thinking it was a "blood-moon"), came back out and took a snap shot. He states that he still did not believe that it was a UFO, so he went back inside to go to the bathroom. When he looked at the photograph after going to the restroom, he figured it was too different to be the moon on a hazy night. He stopped back outside to the spot and started looking for the object again, but it was nowhere to be found. My brother states that he feels "apprehensive" about looking out his window - thinking that he's gotten as close as he wants too.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Edinboro
This sighting has never been favorited.
